metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6463 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Use after free in ANGLE in Google Chrome prior to 81.0.4044.122 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

notes.Note: amurray> The Debian chromium source package is called chromium-browser in Ubuntu mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 19.10, the chromium-browser package is just a script that installs the Chromium snap tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '80.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:78.4.3+build1-0ubuntu1').
